articles.title: Axar tells Jadeja 'Meri bowling hi nahi aa rahi'; reply leaves him speechless - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ravindra Jadeja has the perfect reply when Axar Patel complained jokingly that he isn't getting to bowl many overs in the Border Gavaskar trophy Test series between India and Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: We are just halfway through the Border-Gavaskar Trophy and India's spinners are already all over Australia. The spin trio of R Ashwin, Ravindra Jadeja and Axar Patel have combined to take 32 of the 4… [+3568 chars]
